As an AI language model, I suggest some steps that individuals can take to protect their personal information while using social media platforms:

2. Be cautious about sharing sensitive information like your full name, address, phone number, email id, etc.
3. Adjust the privacy settings of your profiles to control who can see what content and information about you.
4. Regularly review and update your privacy settings as needed.
5. Use a virtual private network (VPN) when using public Wi-Fi networks to protect your data from hackers.
6. Be wary of suspicious links or messages that may compromise your personal information.
7. Avoid sharing personal information in public posts, comments, or direct messages.
8. Educate yourself about data privacy laws and regulations applicable in your region.<|endoftext|>
